serviceData.title: Motion Graphics
serviceData.description: Bring stories to life with captivating motion graphics, 2D animations, and rotoscoping.

serviceData.title: 3D Animation
serviceData.description: Bring stories to life with stunning 3D animations, visual effects, and immersive virtual experiences.

serviceData.title: Video Editing
serviceData.description: Seamless editing workflows for any project scale with expert color correction and grading.

serviceData.title: Cinema format
serviceData.description: J2K file conversion and assistance with censor certification for seamless theater screenings.

serviceData.title: Color Grading
serviceData.description: Enhance the visual appeal of your videos with professional color correction and grading to achieve cinematic quality.

serviceData.title: Live event
serviceData.description: Multicamera shoots with video Switcher & lives on YouTube, Team & Zoom.

serviceData.title: Equipment Rentals
serviceData.description: High-quality cameras, LED lighting, projectors, and sound equipment to elevate your production.

serviceData.title: Sound
serviceData.description: Professional audio solutions, including mixers, JBL speakers, wireless mics, DJ, and karaoke systems.

serviceData.title: Uploading TVCs & film
serviceData.description: Uploading TVCs and films via eBus and Dropbox for hassle-free distribution.

serviceData.title: Corporate Shoots
serviceData.description: Specialized services for corporate films, interviews, and product showcase videos.
